translation.welcome: Embark on a distinguished journey into the captivating world of anime while putting your memory to an exquisite challenge!
translation.descriptionSolo: CHALLENGE YOURSELF IN A SOLO MEMORY GAME AND BEAT YOUR OWN SCORES TO BECOME THE MEMORY MASTER!
translation.descriptionDuo: INVITE A FRIEND TO JOIN YOU IN A FRIENDLY MEMORY COMPETITION, WHERE ONLY THE BEST PAIR OF BRAINS WILL PREVAIL
translation.descriptionMultijoueur: CONNECT AND FACE OPPONENTS FROM AROUND THE WORLD IN A FIERCE BATTLE FOR ONLINE MEMORY SUPREMACY!
translation.name: First Name
translation.waitPlayer: Waiting for another player to join...
translation.requestNewGame: Your opponent wants to play another game with you.
